mapper.select:
with temp as ( select mfb.group_id,mfb.hos_id,to_char(mfb.copy_code) as copy_code,mid.inv_code,mid.inv_name, mid.memory_encoding, mid.inv_model,hfd.fac_name,hu.unit_name,
nvl(sup.sup_id,0) sup_id,hsdd.sup_name,
mtd.mat_type_code,mtd.mat_type_name,
mfb.batch_no,
t_date.inva_date,
mfb.store_id,hsd.store_name,
t_date.confirm_date,
mfb.price,sum(mfb.left_amount) as amount,sum(mfb.left_money) as money,mid.bid_code,mfb.location_id,mld.location_name ,mid.stora_tran_cond from mat_fifo_balance mfb left join mat_inv_dict mid on mfb.group_id = mid.group_id and mfb.hos_id = mid.hos_id and mfb.copy_code = mid.copy_code and mfb.inv_id = mid.inv_id and mid.is_stop = 0
left join ( SELECT mim.confirm_date, mind.inv_id, mind.price, mind.batch_no, mind.batch_sn, mind.bar_code ,mind.inva_date FROM mat_in_main mim LEFT JOIN mat_in_detail mind ON mim.group_id = mind.group_id AND mim.hos_id = mind.hos_id AND mim.copy_code = mind.copy_code AND mim.in_id = mind.in_id LEFT JOIN mat_bus_type mbt ON mim.bus_type_code = mbt.bus_type_code WHERE mim.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mim.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mim.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mim.state = 3
and mind.in_detail_id in ( select tem3.in_detail_id from (select tem1.inv_id, tem1.batch_no, tem1.batch_sn, tem1.bar_code, tem1.price , max(in_detail_id) as in_detail_id from mat_in_detail tem1 left join mat_in_main tem2 on tem1.in_id = tem2.in_id where tem1.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tem1.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tem1.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tem2.bus_type_code in (1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 16, 18, 22) and tem2.state=3 and tem1.amount > 0 group by tem1.inv_id,tem1.batch_no,tem1.batch_sn,tem1.bar_code , tem1.price ) tem3 ) AND (mbt.sel_flag = 'in' or mim.bus_type_code = '47') ) t_date on mfb.inv_id = t_date.inv_id and mfb.batch_sn = t_date.batch_sn and mfb.batch_no = t_date.batch_no and mfb.bar_code = t_date.bar_code and mfb.price = t_date.price
left join hos_fac_dict hfd on mid.group_id = hfd.group_id and mid.hos_id = hfd.hos_id and mid.fac_id = hfd.fac_id and mid.fac_no = hfd.fac_no left join hos_unit hu on mid.group_id = hu.group_id and mid.hos_id = hu.hos_id and mid.unit_code = hu.unit_code and hu.is_stop = 0
left join ( SELECT mim.sup_id,mind.inv_id,mind.price, mind.batch_no, mind.batch_sn, mind.bar_code FROM mat_in_main mim LEFT JOIN mat_in_detail mind ON mim.group_id = mind.group_id AND mim.hos_id = mind.hos_id AND mim.copy_code = mind.copy_code AND mim.in_id = mind.in_id LEFT JOIN mat_bus_type mbt ON mim.bus_type_code = mbt.bus_type_code WHERE mim.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mim.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mim.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mim.state = 3
and mind.in_detail_id in ( select tem3.in_detail_id from (select tem1.inv_id, tem1.batch_no, tem1.batch_sn, tem1.bar_code , tem1.price , max(in_detail_id) as in_detail_id from mat_in_detail tem1 left join mat_in_main tem2 on tem1.in_id = tem2.in_id where tem1.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tem1.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tem1.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tem2.bus_type_code in (1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 16, 18, 22) and tem2.state=3 and tem1.amount > 0 group by tem1.inv_id,tem1.batch_no,tem1.batch_sn,tem1.bar_code , tem1.price ) tem3 ) AND (mbt.sel_flag = 'in' or mim.bus_type_code = '47') ) sup on mfb.inv_id = sup.inv_id and mfb.batch_sn = sup.batch_sn and mfb.batch_no = sup.batch_no and mfb.bar_code = sup.bar_code and mfb.price = sup.price left join hos_sup_dict hsdd on mfb.group_id = hsdd.group_id and mfb.hos_id = hsdd.hos_id and sup.sup_id = hsdd.sup_id and hsdd.is_stop = 0
left join mat_type_dict mtd on mid.group_id = mtd.group_id and mid.hos_id = mtd.hos_id and mid.copy_code = mtd.copy_code and mid.mat_type_id = mtd.mat_type_id and mtd.is_stop = 0
left join mat_store_inv msi on mfb.group_id = msi.group_id and mfb.hos_id = msi.hos_id and mfb.copy_code = msi.copy_code and mfb.store_id = msi.store_id and mfb.inv_id = msi.inv_id left join mat_location_dict mld on msi.group_id = mld.group_id and msi.hos_id = mld.hos_id and msi.location_id = mld.location_id and mld.is_stop = 0 left join hos_store_dict hsd on mfb.group_id = hsd.group_id and mfb.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and mfb.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
mfb.group_id = #{group_id} and mfb.hos_id = #{hos_id} and mfb.copy_code = #{copy_code}
and mid.inv_code is not null
and to_char(mfb.store_id) in ( select perm_code from v_user_data_perm where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and table_code = 'HOS_STORE_DICT' and user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_read = 1 and is_write = 1 )
and mfb.store_id = #{store_id}
and mtd.mat_type_code like '${mat_type_code}%'
and ( mid.inv_name like '%${inv_info}%' or mid.alias like '%${inv_info}%' or mid.inv_code like '%${inv_info}%' or upper(mid.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${inv_info}')||'%' or upper(mid.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${inv_info}')||'%' )
and ( mld.location_code like '%${location_code}%' or mld.location_name like '%${location_code}%' or upper(mld.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${location_code}')||'%' or upper(mld.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${location_code}')||'%' )
and ( hfd.fac_code like '%${fac_code}%' or hfd.fac_name like '%${fac_code}%' or upper(hfd.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${fac_code}')||'%' or upper(hfd.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${fac_code}')||'%' )
and mfb.batch_no like '%${batch_no}%'
and mid.is_charge = #{is_charge}
and mid.is_highvalue = #{is_highvalue}
and mfb.sup_id = #{sup_id}
and mtd.is_last = '1'
and mtd.type_level = #{type_level}
and (mid.inv_model like '%${inv_model}%'or mid.inv_name like '%${inv_model}%' or mid.inv_code like '%${inv_model}%' or mid.spell_code like '%${inv_model}%' or mid.wbx_code like '%${inv_model}%'
)
group by mfb.group_id,mfb.hos_id,mfb.copy_code,mid.inv_code,mid.inv_name, mid.memory_encoding, mid.inv_model, hfd.fac_name,hu.unit_name,
nvl(sup.sup_id,0),hsdd.sup_name,
mtd.mat_type_code, mtd.mat_type_name,
mfb.batch_no,
t_date.inva_date,
mfb.store_id,hsd.store_name,
t_date.confirm_date,
mfb.price,mid.bid_code,mfb.location_id,mld.location_name ,mid.stora_tran_cond
having sum(mfb.left_amount) <> 0
order by ${sortname} ${sortorder}
order by mid.inv_code desc
)
,temp2 as ( select maf.group_id,maf.hos_id,maf.copy_code,mid.inv_code,mid.inv_name, mid.memory_encoding, mid.inv_model, hfd.fac_name,hu.unit_name,
sup.sup_id,hsdd.sup_name,
mtd.mat_type_code,mtd.mat_type_name,
maf.batch_no,
t_date.inva_date,
maf.store_id,hsd.store_name,
t_date.confirm_date,
maf.price, sum(maf.left_amount) as amount,sum(maf.left_money) as money,mid.bid_code,maf.location_id,mld.location_name,mid.stora_tran_cond from mat_affi_fifo maf left join mat_inv_dict mid on maf.group_id = mid.group_id and maf.hos_id = mid.hos_id and maf.copy_code = mid.copy_code and maf.inv_id = mid.inv_id and mid.is_stop = 0 left join mat_location_dict mld on maf.group_id=mld.group_id and maf.hos_id=mld.hos_id and maf.location_id=mld.location_id and mld.is_stop=0
left join mat_batch_validity mbv on maf.group_id = mbv.group_id and maf.hos_id = mbv.hos_id and maf.copy_code = mbv.copy_code and maf.inv_id = mbv.inv_id and maf.batch_no = mbv.batch_no
left join hos_fac_dict hfd on mid.group_id = hfd.group_id and mid.hos_id = hfd.hos_id and mid.fac_id = hfd.fac_id and mid.fac_no=hfd.fac_no left join hos_unit hu on mid.group_id = hu.group_id and mid.hos_id = hu.hos_id and mid.unit_code = hu.unit_code and hu.is_stop = 0
left join ( SELECT mai.sup_id,maid.inv_id,maid.price, maid.batch_no, maid.batch_sn, maid.bar_code FROM mat_affi_in mai LEFT JOIN mat_affi_in_detail maid ON mai.group_id = maid.group_id AND mai.hos_id = maid.hos_id AND mai.copy_code = maid.copy_code AND mai.in_id = maid.in_id
WHERE mai.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mai.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mai.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mai.state = 3 and mai.bus_type_code in (1,4,6,8,27) ) sup on maf.inv_id = sup.inv_id and maf.batch_sn = sup.batch_sn and maf.batch_no = sup.batch_no and maf.bar_code = sup.bar_code and maf.price = sup.price left join hos_sup_dict hsdd on maf.group_id = hsdd.group_id and maf.hos_id = hsdd.hos_id and sup.sup_id = hsdd.sup_id and hsdd.is_stop = 0
left join mat_type_dict mtd on mid.group_id = mtd.group_id and mid.hos_id = mtd.hos_id and mid.copy_code = mtd.copy_code and mid.mat_type_id = mtd.mat_type_id and mtd.is_stop = 0 left join hos_store_dict hsd on maf.group_id = hsd.group_id and maf.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and maf.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
left join ( SELECT mai.confirm_date, maid.inv_id, maid.price, maid.batch_no, maid.batch_sn, maid.bar_code ,maid.inva_date FROM mat_affi_in mai LEFT JOIN mat_affi_in_detail maid ON mai.group_id = maid.group_id AND mai.hos_id = maid.hos_id AND mai.copy_code = maid.copy_code AND mai.in_id = maid.in_id
WHERE mai.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mai.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mai.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mai.state = 3 and mai.bus_type_code in (1,4,6,8,27) ) t_date on maf.inv_id = t_date.inv_id and maf.batch_sn = t_date.batch_sn and maf.batch_no = t_date.batch_no and maf.bar_code = t_date.bar_code and maf.price = t_date.price
maf.group_id = #{group_id} and maf.hos_id = #{hos_id} and maf.copy_code = #{copy_code}
and mid.inv_code is not null
and to_char(maf.store_id) in ( select perm_code from v_user_data_perm where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and table_code = 'HOS_STORE_DICT' and user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_read = 1 and is_write = 1 )
and maf.store_id = #{store_id}
and mtd.mat_type_code like '${mat_type_code}%'
and ( mid.inv_name like '%${inv_info}%' or mid.alias like '%${inv_info}%' or mid.inv_code like '%${inv_info}%' or upper(mid.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${inv_info}')||'%' or upper(mid.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${inv_info}')||'%' )
and ( mld.location_code like '%${location_code}%' or mld.location_name like '%${location_code}%' or upper(mld.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${location_code}')||'%' or upper(mld.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${location_code}')||'%' )
and ( hfd.fac_code like '%${fac_code}%' or hfd.fac_name like '%${fac_code}%' or upper(hfd.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${fac_code}')||'%' or upper(hfd.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${fac_code}')||'%' )
and maf.batch_no like '%${batch_no}%'
and mid.is_charge = #{is_charge}
and mid.is_highvalue = #{is_highvalue}
and maf.sup_id = #{sup_id}
and mtd.is_last = '1'
and mtd.type_level = #{type_level}
group by maf.group_id,maf.hos_id,maf.copy_code,mid.inv_code,mid.inv_name, mid.memory_encoding, mid.inv_model, hfd.fac_name,hu.unit_name,
sup.sup_id,hsdd.sup_name,
mtd.mat_type_code,mtd.mat_type_name,
maf.batch_no,
t_date.inva_date,
maf.store_id,hsd.store_name,
t_date.confirm_date,
maf.price,mid.bid_code,maf.location_id,mld.location_name ,mid.stora_tran_cond
having sum(maf.left_amount) <> 0
order by ${sortname} ${sortorder}
order by mid.inv_code desc
)
,temp3 as ( select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, inv_code, inv_name, memory_encoding, inv_model, fac_name, unit_name,
sup_id, sup_name,
mat_type_code, mat_type_name,
batch_no,
inva_date,
store_id, store_name,
confirm_date,
price,amount,money ,bid_code,location_name,stora_tran_cond from temp a
union all select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, inv_code, inv_name, memory_encoding, inv_model, fac_name, unit_name,
sup_id, sup_name,
mat_type_code, mat_type_name,
batch_no,
inva_date,
store_id, store_name,
confirm_date,
price,amount,money,bid_code,location_name,stora_tran_cond from temp2 b
order by location_name,memory_encoding, inv_name, inv_code
order by memory_encoding, inv_name, inv_code
) select group_id,hos_id,copy_code,to_char(inv_code) inv_code,inv_name, memory_encoding, inv_model, fac_name,unit_name,
sup_id, sup_name,
mat_type_code,mat_type_name,
batch_no,
inva_date,
store_id, store_name,
confirm_date,
price,amount,money ,bid_code,location_name,stora_tran_cond from temp3 c union all select NULL AS group_id, NULL AS hos_id, NULL AS copy_code, to_char('合计') AS inv_code, NULL AS inv_name , NULL AS memory_encoding, NULL AS inv_model, NULL AS fac_name, NULL AS unit_name,
NULL AS sup_id, NULL AS sup_name,
NULL AS mat_type_code, NULL AS mat_type_name
, NULL AS batch_no
, NULL AS inva_date
, NULL AS store_id, NULL AS store_name
,NULL AS confirm_date
, NULL AS price, sum(d.amount) as amount, SUM(d.money) AS money,null bid_code,null location_name, null as stora_tran_cond from temp3 d

with temp as ( select mfb.group_id,mfb.hos_id,to_char(mfb.copy_code) as copy_code,mid.inv_code,mid.inv_name, mid.memory_encoding, mid.inv_model,hfd.fac_name,hu.unit_name,
nvl(sup.sup_id,0) sup_id,hsdd.sup_name,
mtd.mat_type_code,mtd.mat_type_name,
mfb.batch_no,
t_date.inva_date,
mfb.store_id,hsd.store_name,
t_date.confirm_date,
mfb.price,sum(mfb.left_amount) as amount,sum(mfb.left_money) as money,mid.bid_code,mfb.location_id,mld.location_name ,mid.stora_tran_cond from mat_fifo_balance mfb left join mat_inv_dict mid on mfb.group_id = mid.group_id and mfb.hos_id = mid.hos_id and mfb.copy_code = mid.copy_code and mfb.inv_id = mid.inv_id and mid.is_stop = 0
left join ( SELECT mim.confirm_date, mind.inv_id, mind.price, mind.batch_no, mind.batch_sn, mind.bar_code ,mind.inva_date FROM mat_in_main mim LEFT JOIN mat_in_detail mind ON mim.group_id = mind.group_id AND mim.hos_id = mind.hos_id AND mim.copy_code = mind.copy_code AND mim.in_id = mind.in_id LEFT JOIN mat_bus_type mbt ON mim.bus_type_code = mbt.bus_type_code WHERE mim.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mim.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mim.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mim.state = 3
and mind.in_detail_id in ( select tem3.in_detail_id from (select tem1.inv_id, tem1.batch_no, tem1.batch_sn, tem1.bar_code, tem1.price , max(in_detail_id) as in_detail_id from mat_in_detail tem1 left join mat_in_main tem2 on tem1.in_id = tem2.in_id where tem1.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tem1.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tem1.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tem2.bus_type_code in (1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 16, 18, 22) and tem2.state=3 and tem1.amount > 0 group by tem1.inv_id,tem1.batch_no,tem1.batch_sn,tem1.bar_code , tem1.price ) tem3 ) AND (mbt.sel_flag = 'in' or mim.bus_type_code = '47') ) t_date on mfb.inv_id = t_date.inv_id and mfb.batch_sn = t_date.batch_sn and mfb.batch_no = t_date.batch_no and mfb.bar_code = t_date.bar_code and mfb.price = t_date.price
left join hos_fac_dict hfd on mid.group_id = hfd.group_id and mid.hos_id = hfd.hos_id and mid.fac_id = hfd.fac_id and mid.fac_no = hfd.fac_no left join hos_unit hu on mid.group_id = hu.group_id and mid.hos_id = hu.hos_id and mid.unit_code = hu.unit_code and hu.is_stop = 0
left join ( SELECT mim.sup_id,mind.inv_id,mind.price, mind.batch_no, mind.batch_sn, mind.bar_code FROM mat_in_main mim LEFT JOIN mat_in_detail mind ON mim.group_id = mind.group_id AND mim.hos_id = mind.hos_id AND mim.copy_code = mind.copy_code AND mim.in_id = mind.in_id LEFT JOIN mat_bus_type mbt ON mim.bus_type_code = mbt.bus_type_code WHERE mim.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mim.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mim.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mim.state = 3
and mind.in_detail_id in ( select tem3.in_detail_id from (select tem1.inv_id, tem1.batch_no, tem1.batch_sn, tem1.bar_code , tem1.price , max(in_detail_id) as in_detail_id from mat_in_detail tem1 left join mat_in_main tem2 on tem1.in_id = tem2.in_id where tem1.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tem1.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tem1.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tem2.bus_type_code in (1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 16, 18, 22) and tem2.state=3 and tem1.amount > 0 group by tem1.inv_id,tem1.batch_no,tem1.batch_sn,tem1.bar_code , tem1.price ) tem3 ) AND (mbt.sel_flag = 'in' or mim.bus_type_code = '47') ) sup on mfb.inv_id = sup.inv_id and mfb.batch_sn = sup.batch_sn and mfb.batch_no = sup.batch_no and mfb.bar_code = sup.bar_code and mfb.price = sup.price left join hos_sup_dict hsdd on mfb.group_id = hsdd.group_id and mfb.hos_id = hsdd.hos_id and sup.sup_id = hsdd.sup_id and hsdd.is_stop = 0
left join mat_type_dict mtd on mid.group_id = mtd.group_id and mid.hos_id = mtd.hos_id and mid.copy_code = mtd.copy_code and mid.mat_type_id = mtd.mat_type_id and mtd.is_stop = 0
left join mat_store_inv msi on mfb.group_id = msi.group_id and mfb.hos_id = msi.hos_id and mfb.copy_code = msi.copy_code and mfb.store_id = msi.store_id and mfb.inv_id = msi.inv_id left join mat_location_dict mld on msi.group_id = mld.group_id and msi.hos_id = mld.hos_id and msi.location_id = mld.location_id and mld.is_stop = 0 left join hos_store_dict hsd on mfb.group_id = hsd.group_id and mfb.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and mfb.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
mfb.group_id = #{group_id} and mfb.hos_id = #{hos_id} and mfb.copy_code = #{copy_code}
and mid.inv_code is not null
and to_char(mfb.store_id) in ( select perm_code from v_user_data_perm where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and table_code = 'HOS_STORE_DICT' and user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_read = 1 and is_write = 1 )
and mfb.store_id = #{store_id}
and mtd.mat_type_code like '${mat_type_code}%'
and ( mid.inv_name like '%${inv_info}%' or mid.alias like '%${inv_info}%' or mid.inv_code like '%${inv_info}%' or upper(mid.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${inv_info}')||'%' or upper(mid.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${inv_info}')||'%' )
and ( mld.location_code like '%${location_code}%' or mld.location_name like '%${location_code}%' or upper(mld.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${location_code}')||'%' or upper(mld.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${location_code}')||'%' )
and ( hfd.fac_code like '%${fac_code}%' or hfd.fac_name like '%${fac_code}%' or upper(hfd.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${fac_code}')||'%' or upper(hfd.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${fac_code}')||'%' )
and mfb.batch_no like '%${batch_no}%'
and mid.is_charge = #{is_charge}
and mid.is_highvalue = #{is_highvalue}
and mfb.sup_id = #{sup_id}
and mtd.is_last = '1'
and mtd.type_level = #{type_level}
and (mid.inv_model like '%${inv_model}%'or mid.inv_name like '%${inv_model}%' or mid.inv_code like '%${inv_model}%' or mid.spell_code like '%${inv_model}%' or mid.wbx_code like '%${inv_model}%'
)
group by mfb.group_id,mfb.hos_id,mfb.copy_code,mid.inv_code,mid.inv_name, mid.memory_encoding, mid.inv_model, hfd.fac_name,hu.unit_name,
nvl(sup.sup_id,0),hsdd.sup_name,
mtd.mat_type_code, mtd.mat_type_name,
mfb.batch_no,
t_date.inva_date,
mfb.store_id,hsd.store_name,
t_date.confirm_date,
mfb.price,mid.bid_code,mfb.location_id,mld.location_name ,mid.stora_tran_cond
having sum(mfb.left_amount) <> 0
order by ${sortname} ${sortorder}
order by mid.inv_code desc
)
,temp2 as ( select maf.group_id,maf.hos_id,maf.copy_code,mid.inv_code,mid.inv_name, mid.memory_encoding, mid.inv_model, hfd.fac_name,hu.unit_name,
sup.sup_id,hsdd.sup_name,
mtd.mat_type_code,mtd.mat_type_name,
maf.batch_no,
t_date.inva_date,
maf.store_id,hsd.store_name,
t_date.confirm_date,
maf.price, sum(maf.left_amount) as amount,sum(maf.left_money) as money,mid.bid_code,maf.location_id,mld.location_name,mid.stora_tran_cond from mat_affi_fifo maf left join mat_inv_dict mid on maf.group_id = mid.group_id and maf.hos_id = mid.hos_id and maf.copy_code = mid.copy_code and maf.inv_id = mid.inv_id and mid.is_stop = 0 left join mat_location_dict mld on maf.group_id=mld.group_id and maf.hos_id=mld.hos_id and maf.location_id=mld.location_id and mld.is_stop=0
left join mat_batch_validity mbv on maf.group_id = mbv.group_id and maf.hos_id = mbv.hos_id and maf.copy_code = mbv.copy_code and maf.inv_id = mbv.inv_id and maf.batch_no = mbv.batch_no
left join hos_fac_dict hfd on mid.group_id = hfd.group_id and mid.hos_id = hfd.hos_id and mid.fac_id = hfd.fac_id and mid.fac_no=hfd.fac_no left join hos_unit hu on mid.group_id = hu.group_id and mid.hos_id = hu.hos_id and mid.unit_code = hu.unit_code and hu.is_stop = 0
left join ( SELECT mai.sup_id,maid.inv_id,maid.price, maid.batch_no, maid.batch_sn, maid.bar_code FROM mat_affi_in mai LEFT JOIN mat_affi_in_detail maid ON mai.group_id = maid.group_id AND mai.hos_id = maid.hos_id AND mai.copy_code = maid.copy_code AND mai.in_id = maid.in_id
WHERE mai.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mai.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mai.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mai.state = 3 and mai.bus_type_code in (1,4,6,8,27) ) sup on maf.inv_id = sup.inv_id and maf.batch_sn = sup.batch_sn and maf.batch_no = sup.batch_no and maf.bar_code = sup.bar_code and maf.price = sup.price left join hos_sup_dict hsdd on maf.group_id = hsdd.group_id and maf.hos_id = hsdd.hos_id and sup.sup_id = hsdd.sup_id and hsdd.is_stop = 0
left join mat_type_dict mtd on mid.group_id = mtd.group_id and mid.hos_id = mtd.hos_id and mid.copy_code = mtd.copy_code and mid.mat_type_id = mtd.mat_type_id and mtd.is_stop = 0 left join hos_store_dict hsd on maf.group_id = hsd.group_id and maf.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and maf.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
left join ( SELECT mai.confirm_date, maid.inv_id, maid.price, maid.batch_no, maid.batch_sn, maid.bar_code ,maid.inva_date FROM mat_affi_in mai LEFT JOIN mat_affi_in_detail maid ON mai.group_id = maid.group_id AND mai.hos_id = maid.hos_id AND mai.copy_code = maid.copy_code AND mai.in_id = maid.in_id
WHERE mai.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mai.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mai.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mai.state = 3 and mai.bus_type_code in (1,4,6,8,27) ) t_date on maf.inv_id = t_date.inv_id and maf.batch_sn = t_date.batch_sn and maf.batch_no = t_date.batch_no and maf.bar_code = t_date.bar_code and maf.price = t_date.price
maf.group_id = #{group_id} and maf.hos_id = #{hos_id} and maf.copy_code = #{copy_code}
and mid.inv_code is not null
and to_char(maf.store_id) in ( select perm_code from v_user_data_perm where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and table_code = 'HOS_STORE_DICT' and user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_read = 1 and is_write = 1 )
and maf.store_id = #{store_id}
and mtd.mat_type_code like '${mat_type_code}%'
and ( mid.inv_name like '%${inv_info}%' or mid.alias like '%${inv_info}%' or mid.inv_code like '%${inv_info}%' or upper(mid.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${inv_info}')||'%' or upper(mid.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${inv_info}')||'%' )
and ( mld.location_code like '%${location_code}%' or mld.location_name like '%${location_code}%' or upper(mld.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${location_code}')||'%' or upper(mld.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${location_code}')||'%' )
and ( hfd.fac_code like '%${fac_code}%' or hfd.fac_name like '%${fac_code}%' or upper(hfd.spell_code) like '%'||upper('${fac_code}')||'%' or upper(hfd.wbx_code) like '%'||upper('${fac_code}')||'%' )
and maf.batch_no like '%${batch_no}%'
and mid.is_charge = #{is_charge}
and mid.is_highvalue = #{is_highvalue}
and maf.sup_id = #{sup_id}
and mtd.is_last = '1'
and mtd.type_level = #{type_level}
group by maf.group_id,maf.hos_id,maf.copy_code,mid.inv_code,mid.inv_name, mid.memory_encoding, mid.inv_model, hfd.fac_name,hu.unit_name,
sup.sup_id,hsdd.sup_name,
mtd.mat_type_code,mtd.mat_type_name,
maf.batch_no,
t_date.inva_date,
maf.store_id,hsd.store_name,
t_date.confirm_date,
maf.price,mid.bid_code,maf.location_id,mld.location_name ,mid.stora_tran_cond
having sum(maf.left_amount) <> 0
order by ${sortname} ${sortorder}
order by mid.inv_code desc
)
,temp3 as ( select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, inv_code, inv_name, memory_encoding, inv_model, fac_name, unit_name,
sup_id, sup_name,
mat_type_code, mat_type_name,
batch_no,
inva_date,
store_id, store_name,
confirm_date,
price,amount,money ,bid_code,location_name,stora_tran_cond from temp a
union all select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, inv_code, inv_name, memory_encoding, inv_model, fac_name, unit_name,
sup_id, sup_name,
mat_type_code, mat_type_name,
batch_no,
inva_date,
store_id, store_name,
confirm_date,
price,amount,money,bid_code,location_name,stora_tran_cond from temp2 b
order by location_name,memory_encoding, inv_name, inv_code
order by memory_encoding, inv_name, inv_code
) select row_number() over (order by location_name) rn ,group_id,hos_id,copy_code,to_char(inv_code) inv_code,inv_name, memory_encoding, inv_model, fac_name,unit_name,
sup_id, sup_name,
mat_type_code,mat_type_name,
batch_no,
inva_date,
store_id, store_name,
confirm_date,
price,amount,money ,bid_code,location_name,stora_tran_cond from temp3 c union all select null as rn, NULL AS group_id, NULL AS hos_id, NULL AS copy_code, to_char('合计') AS inv_code, NULL AS inv_name , NULL AS memory_encoding, NULL AS inv_model, NULL AS fac_name, NULL AS unit_name,
NULL AS sup_id, NULL AS sup_name,
NULL AS mat_type_code, NULL AS mat_type_name
, NULL AS batch_no
, NULL AS inva_date
, NULL AS store_id, NULL AS store_name
,NULL AS confirm_date
, NULL AS price, sum(d.amount) as amount, SUM(d.money) AS money,null bid_code,null location_name, null as stora_tran_cond from temp3 d
